briefdescription.para: In-memory representation of the value of an opaque attribute.

detaileddescription.para: Opaque attributes cannot have authored values, but every typename in Sdf must have a corresponding constructable C++ value type; SdfOpaqueValue is the type associated with opaque attributes. Opaque values intentionally cannot hold any information, cannot be parsed, and cannot be serialized to a layer.
SdfOpaqueValue is also the type associated with group attributes. A group attribute is an opaque attribute that represents a group of other properties.
